title: Old School feature poll #1 - March 2013
description: This poll runs from Thursday 14th March until Wednesday 20th March GMT (inclusive).

questions.question: The Easter 2007 event is re-activated for Easter this year.
�Unidentified herbs� are changed to become �grimy <herbname>�.
A command is added to toggle the visibility of roofs on and off.
On the log-in screen, pressing the 'enter' key  initiates the log-in attempt.
Pressing the 'tab' key starts a reply to your last incoming private message.
Right-click on a private message to start replying to it.
A few �Free� worlds are made available, so PKers can fight with free-to-play gear limits. (NB: membership is still required)
Your run-mode setting is remembered across log-ins.
Left-click on bank booths for direct access to your bank.

title: Old School feature poll #2 � April 2013
description: This poll runs from Thursday 4th April until Wednesday 10th April (inclusive).

questions.question: Some additional OldSchool worlds will be added, with F2P restrictions applied so that clans and PKers can engage in PVP combat in the Wilderness without members� items or abilities. The worlds will remain accessible only to RuneScape members. Players who do not wish to use these worlds would not be required to visit them, and the world-picker would not send people to these worlds who had not manually selected them.
Improve the pathfinding/routefinding code to prevent the bugs where players run back and forth and dance around large npcs when trying to fight them.
Update some of the training obstacles, such as pipes, at various agility courses to allow multiple players to use them simultaneously.
Holding down the mouse wheel button will allow you to rotate the camera, like the arrow keys do.
The list of activities (e.g trading, Castle Wars) from the themed worlds forum post will be added to the world select pages.
If a world is full, players trying to log into it will be placed in a queue, rather than having to repeatedly login until there is space.
While you are trading with another player, their chat messages will be copied to your Trade chat tab so that you can read them more easily.
Players will be permitted to return to Ape Atoll without claiming the Defence XP reward of the Monkey Madness quest, allowing pures to attempt the monkey chapter of Recipe for Disaster.

If you cast a second alchemy spell while a previous alchemy spell is still in progress, the second spell is queued up to run when the first one finishes. This would not queue up more than one spell at any time.

title: Old School Rare Item poll #1 � April 2013
description: This poll comes in two sections, please make sure you read the Dev Blog: Rare Items on the Old School Forums prior to voting. Tradable Rare Items are: Easter eggs from 2002, pumpkins from 2001, Halloween masks, Santa hats, Christmas crackers, party hats, disks of returning and half full wine jugs. Untradeable Rare Items are: bunny ears, scythes, yo-yos, rubber chickens, zombie heads, hats and scarves from Christmas 2005, marionettes, Easter rings, the skeleton set, Jack Lantern's mask, reindeer hats, Wintumber trees, war ships and chicken suits.

questions.question: Would you like rare items to return in some form? (a list of all rare items can be found at the top of this poll)
If you vote for rare items to return, would you like the currently tradeable rare items to remain tradeable? (a list of all tradeable rare items can be found at the top of this poll)

title: Old School Rare Item poll #2 � April 2013
description: This poll comes in two sections, please make sure you read the Dev Blog: Rare Items on the Old School Forums prior to voting. In the last poll you voted for currently tradeable rare items to remain tradeable. Questions 1-10 deal with tradeable rare items. Questions 11-20 deal with untradeable rare items. Tradeable Rare Items are: Easter eggs from 2002, pumpkins from 2001, Halloween masks, Santa hats, Christmas crackers, party hats, disks of returning and half full wine jugs. Untradeable Rare Items are: bunny ears, scythes, yo-yos, rubber chickens, zombie heads, hats and scarves from Christmas 2005, marionettes, Easter rings, the skeleton set, Jack Lantern's mask, reindeer hats, Wintumber trees, war ships and chicken suits.

questions.question: Would you like tradeable rare items to only be available for a limited period after their introduction?
Would you like tradeable rare items to be distributed using similar mechanics as we did before (dropping them, holiday events)?
Would you like tradeable rare items to appear as a very rare reward from treasure trails?
Would you like tradeable rare items to be distributed through very rare monster drops?
Would you like to have an NPC shop you can buy tradeable rare items from for a small amount of GP?
Would you like to have an NPC shop you can buy tradeable rare items from for a large amount of GP?
Would you like tradeable rare items to be given out as rewards from community events?
Would you like us to give one of each tradeable rare item to every Old School player?
Would you like tradeable rare items to appear as rare drops from skilling?
Would you like us to introduce seasonal events for each tradeable rare item?
Would you like untradeable rare items to only be available for a limited period after their introduction?
Would you like untradeable rare items to be distributed using similar mechanics as we did before (dropping them, holiday events)?
Would you like untradeable rare items to appear as a very rare reward from treasure trails?
Would you like untradeable rare items to be distributed through very rare monster drops?
Would you like to have an NPC shop you can buy untradeable rare items from for a small amount of GP?
Would you like to have an NPC shop you can buy untradeable rare items from for a large amount of GP?
Would you like untradeable rare items to be given out as rewards from community events?
Would you like us to give one of each untradeable rare item to every Old School player?
Would you like untradeable rare items to appear as rare drops from skilling?
Would you like us to introduce seasonal events for each untradeable rare item?

title: Old School feature poll #3 � April 2013
description: This poll runs from Thursday 25th April until midday (BST) Wednesday 1st May.

questions.question: Update the TzHaar Fight Cave so that if you log out or disconnect during a wave, you automatically restart that wave when you log back in. Remember, you can already pause the Fight Cave by pressing Logout, then completing your current wave and waiting for the game to log you out automatically. However, that existing feature isn't always helpful enough when there's a system update, or if your connection's unstable.

Make rock cakes available to players who have completed the dwarf chapter of Recipe for Disaster, for a fee of 100 coins. The rock cakes cause damage if you try to eat them, which is useful if you want low health to make Dharok's kit more effective.

Make the bone key available to players who have completed the Shilo Village quest, for a fee of 100 coins. The bone key gives access to a tomb full of rapidly-spawning undead creatures, which is useful for combat training. Update the entrance to the tomb so that the key ring can be used to store the bone key.
Add a right-click option to the Slayer gem so that you can check your progress on your Slayer assignment more conveniently.

Update Smithing so that you're no longer locked into the action when you smith multiple items at an anvil. Currently, if you request to smith 10 maces, you can't walk away from the anvil until you've finished, and your run energy doesn't recharge while you're smithing. If we made this change, you would be able to walk away from the anvil at any time, and your run energy would recharge while you were smithing.

Update number dialogue boxes to understand that 'k' = 'thousand' and 'm' = 'million'. At the moment, you have to count the zeroes carefully when typing large numbers for trading or banking. If we made this change, you'd be able to type '5k' or '10m' rather than '5000' or '10000000' respectively.
Reset prayer points and drained stats at the end of Castle Wars, since it doesn't always do this if you play to the end of the game.

Re-arrange the F-key shortcuts to better match the behaviour of the main version of RuneScape. See the 'Third Old School RuneScape Content Poll' developer blog for details of exactly what this would affect.

title: Old School rare item poll #3 � May 2013
description: Detailed below are a number of ways that rare items can return, all of which came from your ideas. You can vote yes or no to each suggestion. If none of the ideas for an item pass the 75% threshold we do have a back up method for introducing them into Old School, details of which can be found below. If more than one of the ideas for bringing back a specific item passes the poll, we will implement all of the ideas that have passed. Back Up Plan:

questions.question: Easter eggs from 2002: A rare chance that chickens will drop them when killed.
Easter eggs from 2002: Trade God bird eggs with Gertrude's son for Easter eggs.
Easter eggs from 2002: When a Rabbit escapes a snare, there's a small chance it will leave behind an Easter Egg.
Bunny ears: Can be crafted by using a needle on Polar Kebbit fur.
Bunny ears: A rare drop from rabbits.
Pumpkin from 2001: A spawn point in farming allotments.
Pumpkin from 2001: A rare harvest from allotments when farming.
Halloween masks: Perform a panic emote in a specific location to spawn an NPC that will give you one.
Halloween masks: A spawn point in Draynor Manor.
Halloween masks: Dropped from random Halloween themed monsters (skeleton, zombie, etc).
Santa Hat: A spawn point in snowy areas.
Santa Hat: Trade clockwork animals to an NPC who will reward you with one.
Santa Hat: A random event - Santa's Little Helper needs help prepping for Christmas.
Christmas crackers: Can sometimes be found in balloons dropped from the Party Room.
Party Hats: Pickpocket Party Pete for a chance to get a party hat.
Party Hats: A chance to spawn in balloons dropped in the Party Room.
Party Hats: Given out by the Wise Old Man through text dialogue.
Scythe: Smith it out of iron as you would a normal weapon.
Scythe: When you die, receive one in your inventory.
Scythe: Given to you as a farming implement from Gardener Gunnhild in return for bringing her some wheat.
Yo-yo: Use wool on log to craft one.
Yo-yo: A random event - Santa's Little Helper needs help prepping for Christmas.
Yo-yo: Buy them from the children in Varrock Square for 500gp.
Rubber Chicken: A joker spawns at random times and locations to give them out.
Rubber Chicken: The Easter Bunny gives them out as he has 'found' a stash.
Rubber Chicken: The evil chicken drops them when killed.
Zombie's Head: Dig up from random places in Lumbridge swamp.
Zombie's Head: A chance of dropping from Zombies.
Zombie's Head: Digging near grave areas throughout the game may uncover one.
Hats and Scarves from Christmas 2005: Given out by Iffie.
Marionettes: Sold by Diango for 500gp.
Marionettes: Speak to a master crafter at the crafting guild who will craft one for you if you provide them with wood, wool and dyes.
Easter ring: A chance of them dropping from rabbits.
Easter ring: Obtained when collecting a Rabbit's Foot from Rabbits.
Easter ring: Trade in a rabbit's foot to an NPC for one.
Skeleton set: Search in wells across Runescape for a chance to find one.
Skeleton set: A chance of dropping from zombies or skeletons.
Jack lantern's mask: Use a knife on a tradable pumpkin.
Reindeer hat: Crafted using fur, bones, thread & needle, red bead and 1 cosmic rune.
Reindeer hat: A rare drop from killing Stags in the Enchanted Valley.
Wintumber tree: Use a herring on a specific tree to find one.
Wintumber tree: A chance to drop when you cut down a tree.
Wintumber tree: Talk to Wyson and he'll give you one.
Disk of returning: A chance to find one when searching in random bushes.
Disk of returning: Can be bought in general stores.
Disk of returning: Add an NPC, Thordur, down in the dwarven mines area that you can get one from.
Half full wine jug: A chance to steal one from the wine stall.
Half full wine jug: Obtained after letting your pet cat drink from a full jug.
War ship: Spawn in the original location.
War ship: Bought from Diango.
War ship: Have an in game cryptic clue fest, where you have to speak to certain NPCs with certain items to progress. The end reward is a war ship.
Chicken Suit: Crafted from feathers, yellow dye, thread and needle.

title: Old School feature poll #4 � May 2013
description: This poll runs from Thursday 16th May until midday (BST) Wednesday 22nd May.

questions.question: Long chat messages will wrap themselves to fit in the chatbox rather than vanishing off the edge.
Your Miscellania coffers will be protected by your Bank PIN.
A right-click 'Kick' option will be added to chat-channel messages.
A message will be transmitted to your chat-channel when a 'Kick' request is sent.

When you put items in a compost bin, the game will automatically keep adding them, one by one, until you run out of that item or the bin becomes full. This will work at the same speed as the existing feature that automatically fills all your buckets with compost from a bin.
Pineapples and watermelons will have 'Use' as their left-click option, not 'Eat', since you can't eat them whole anyway.
Tool leprechauns will stand nearer their farming patches instead of wandering so far away.
If you use farming produce on a tool leprechaun, he will convert it to banknote form.
After you teleport with the ectophial, you will automatically go to refill it from the Ectofuntus.
The Bones to Peaches and Bones to Bananas spells will work on more types of bone, up to and including "big bones".
Team capes will be F2P items so they can be used on the worlds that have F2P-style restrictions.
Canoes will be F2P features so they can be used on the worlds that have F2P-style restrictions.

Dunstan will be willing to let you take multiple copies of the law talisman. This would be helpful if you want to make your talisman (or tiara) stay in the same slot in your bank. The talisman and tiara will remain untradeable.
The animation used when you mine a normal rock will be replaced with an older version. This won't apply to ore seams that are built into walls.

Magic carpets will allow you to take a ride without emptying your right hand, and the right-click option on the carpet merchants will skip straight to the choice of destinations with minimal dialogue.
You will be able to cross the bridge in The Hollows between the swamp boat and the old Myreque hideout with a single click after having repaired it.
Ava will let you get replacement devices from her without having to click through so much dialogue.

title: Old School feature poll #5 � Dom Onion Cave, and more...
description: This poll runs from Thursday 6th June until midday (BST) Wednesday 12th June. Along with the usual selection of features you've requested on the forums, we'd like to offer you something bigger in the form of a new minigame.

questions.question: The new minigame will be developed and added to OldSchool RuneScape with the features described in the latest developer blog.
Assuming that the new minigame is created, where should it be placed?
Assuming that the new minigame is created, what should it be called?
Assuming that the new minigame is created, its rewards should include sets of level 50 melee, ranged or magic armour, as described in the developer blog.
Assuming that the new minigame is created, its rewards should include sets of level 65 melee, ranged or magic armour, as described in the developer blog.
Assuming that the new minigame is created, its rewards should include teleport scrolls that take you to any Runecrafting altar.
Assuming that the new minigame is created, its rewards should include teleport scrolls that take you to any player-owned house portal.
A right-click 'Report' option will be added to chat messages for all players.
Characters like Bob who repair Barrows kit would offer to repair all your damaged kit in a single transaction.
The elf will offer to recharge all your teleport crystals in a single transaction.
The herbalist in Nardah will combine potion vials into 4-dose vials, including banknotes.
The amount of rare items spawning on each world should be increased to two.

title: Old School feature poll #6 - Castle Wars, etc.
description: This poll will run until midday (BST) Wednesday 3rd July.

questions.question: In Castle Wars, if you present Lanthus with a device from Ava, he will have its ammo-saving effect applied to the capes you wear in that minigame.
In Castle Wars, altars will be added to the respawn rooms. They will recharge your prayer more slowly than normal altars.
In Castle Wars, barricades will have 'Burn' and 'Extinguish' options to help you set them on fire and put them out more conveniently.
Players will be able to pay an in-game character to switch their respawn point to Edgeville.
The multicannon will be set up and reloaded with a single left-click, instead of requiring you to use items on it repeatedly. Its decay warning message will be made more visible.

A merchant will stand near the respawn points, offering to sell you certain untradeable items that otherwise come from inconvenient places. Initially these items would be: Ectophial, Mage Arena capes, prayer books, Karamja gloves, ghostly kit, Lunar kit, the Barrelchest anchor, the Boots of Lightness and the Cape of Legends.

title: Old School feature poll #7
description: This poll will run until midday (BST) Wednesday 24th July.

questions.question: The Edgeville respawn point feature will be available on F2P-style worlds.
If a player pays to activate the Edgeville respawn point, this will be remembered so that they can toggle it on and off in future without paying any more money.
Ava's ammo-saving effect will be made more powerful inside Castle Wars so that it protects ammo regardless of where it lands, and regardless of what armour you're wearing.
Players will be able to disable the price confirmation messages on the Lunar make-plank spell.
The game will remember your bank preference for Swap/Insert mode over log-out.

A right-click Travel option will be added to spirit trees, Elkoy, Daero, Waydar, and Lumdo. Daero's Travel option will not allow players to return to Ape Atoll after completing his quest without claiming Defence XP.
We will remove the message box that comes up when you click the Shantay Pass bank chest.
Players will be able to win fire capes in the Fight Cave even if they already have one. The Fight Cave attendant will buy unwanted fire capes for 8000 TokKul.
Players will be able to refill waterskins directly at a water source.
The Entrana monks will forbid players from taking gnomeballs to Entrana.
The default price of abyssal whips will be increased so that they are protected over dragon battleaxes on death. The alchemy spells will no longer work on the whip.
The default prices of glory amulets will be increased so that they are protected over rune platebodies on death. The alchemy spells will no longer work on the amulets.
The default prices of Waterbirth Island rings will be increased so that they are protected over skillcapes and Temple Knight hauberks on death. The alchemy spells will no longer work on the rings.

The default prices of rune defenders, fire capes and penance items will be increased so that they are protected over rune armour on death. The alchemy spells will no longer work on the affected items.

title: Goblin Invasion - Intelligence Received
description: We have received intelligence that the goblin horde will soon attack us, you must help us to defeat this threat to our liberty!

questions.question: Where should we position the combined armies of Gielinor?

title: Old School feature poll #8
description: This poll will run until midday (BST) Wednesday 14th August.

questions.question: A 'use all' option will be offered when using bones on a POH altar.
The Lunar spell 'Humidify' will be able to turn clay into soft clay.
A deposit box will be added near the Entrana boat at Port Sarim.
Players will be able to grow more than one spirit tree at a time. Level 91 Farming will be required for two trees, and level 99 for three.
A gardener in Tai Bwo Wannai Village will protect calquat trees from disease on payment of 8 poison ivy berries.
The chat-channel list will use green text for players on the same world as you.

title: The Big Four Priority Poll
description: Now we are nearing the position where we will be able to offer you some significantly larger content updates, we want to find out what your priorities are. Below you have two identical questions. At the end of the poll, we will combine the results to identify the two updates that you want most urgently.

questions.question: Which of these updates is a priority for you?
Which of these updates is a priority for you?

title: Goblin Invasion - Taking Down the High Priest
description: You have battled bravely alongside the armies of Gielinor. Now it is time to enter the lair of the High Priest and we need your expertise once more.

questions.question: Which guards do you want to join you in the assault on the lair of the High Priest?

title: Old School feature poll #9: God Wars & Banks
description: This poll will run until midday (BST) Monday 9th September.

questions.question: The capacity of your bank will be increased by 24 slots (3 rows).
A Search button will be added to the bank screen, allowing you to filter the displayed items.
The bank will remember how many items you withdraw or deposit when you use 'Withdraw-X' or 'Deposit-X', and will offer this number as an extra 'Withdraw' or 'Deposit' option on each item.
A Deposit-All button will be added to the bank screen for attempting to deposit all the items from your inventory.
A Deposit-All button will be added to the bank screen for attempting to deposit all the items that you have equipped.

After you've killed another player in a single-way combat zone in the Wilderness, you will be protected from other players' attacks for 10 seconds. You will not be permitted to log out during this time. This protection will apply only to the player who got the loot, not to any other players who helped with the kill.
Makeover merchants such as Thessalia will be given a right-click option to access their makeover options more conveniently.
The God Wars Dungeon (GWD) will be released as described in the developer blog.
If the GWD is released, the four bosses and their bodyguards will broadcast messages to all players in their rooms to state what items have been dropped, and to whom.
If the GWD is released, the boss room doors will be entrances only, and the altars will have a 'Teleport' option to let you exit.
If the GWD is released, spiritual warriors, rangers and mages should be assigned as Slayer targets very frequently for the first month after launch, and then reduced to a normal rate.
If the GWD is released, when the four bosses drop stacks of herbs, they should do so in banknote form.
If the GWD is released, the Armadyl godsword's special attack will cost 60% of your power.
If the GWD is released, spiritual mages will drop a shard of dragon material that is used to upgrade rune boots into dragon boots, instead of dropping the dragon boots directly.

If the GWD is released, a new degradeable item called Amulet of the Damned would be dropped by the Zamorak boss, with stats equivalent to an amulet of glory. If worn alongside a full Barrows set, this amulet would absorb a fraction of combat damage from any hitsplat over 15 hitpoints. See the dev blog for full details.
If the GWD is released, a magic weapon similar in behaviour to the Staff of Light would be dropped by the Zamorak boss. See the dev blog for full details.
If the GWD is released, an Armadyl crossbow would be dropped by the Saradomin boss. See the dev blog for full details.

title: Old School feature poll #10: New Rewards
description: This poll will run until Wednesday 25th September.

questions.question: A new level 70 crossbow will be released with a range attack bonus of +100 and a prayer bonus of +1 (that's +10 more attack than the runite crossbow). Its attack distance will be +1 greater than the runite crossbow, and it will have the same attack rate. Its special attack would be to double your accuracy for that shot, costing 40% of your energy. The crossbow would be an Armadyl item, but would be dropped by Zilyana because she stole it.
In last poll, where we offered a magic weapon that would behave similarly to the Staff of Light, we didn't specify that it would boost magic damage by 15%. Should it have that bonus?
The new magic weapon has a special attack that halves the melee damage you take for one minute. While that is in effect, should it also halve the melee damage you deal?
The following rings could be imbued, using Nightmare Zone points, giving them higher combat stats: Seer, Archer, Warrior and Beserker.
The following rings could be imbued, using Nightmare Zone points, giving them higher combat stats: Onyx, Dragonstone and Diamond.

Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell an ingredient that upgrades an anti-fire potion to a super anti-fire potion, requiring level 89 Herblore. The super anti-fire potion would block all dragonfire damage, and would also reduce the effects of the KBD's other attacks. Level 93 would be needed to add caviar. The potion and ingredient would be tradeable.

Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell an ingredient that upgrades a super energy potion to an energy renewal potion, requiring level 92 Herblore. The energy renewal potion would restore all your run energy, and keep it topped up for 30 seconds. Level 96 would be needed to add caviar. The potion and ingredient would be tradeable.

Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell an ingredient that upgrades a prayer potion to a super prayer potion, requiring level 94 Herblore. The super prayer potion would increase your Prayer by 4 points more than the existing prayer potion does, and could boost your Prayer stat above its base level to do this. Level 98 would be needed to add caviar. The potion and ingredient would be tradeable.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell packs of 10 unidentified herbs. The herbs taken from these packs would be random, with the same distribution as you get from standard monster drops.
A crystal bow or shield could be upgraded, using Nightmare Zone points, making it keep its combat stats unchanged as it degrades.

If you are wearing a quest cape at the moment when you complete an Endurance dream, the cape could become trimmed light blue, giving it a +2 prayer bonus and increasing its defence stats from +9 to +11.

If you are wearing a quest cape at the moment when you complete a hard Endurance dream, the cape could become trimmed, giving it a +2 prayer bonus and a +1 attack bonus, and increasing its defence stats from +9 to +11. For this cape, you would have a choice of trim colours.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell scrolls of redirection for use on a Teleport to House tablet, redirecting it to any house portal or to Trollheim.

Black masks could be imbued, using Nightmare Zone points. The imbued version would give a 15% bonus to your accuracy and max hit against your assigned Slayer target in melee and ranging, and 15% bonus to your accuracy with magic, and would have no negative attack bonuses in ranging or magic. The imbued masks would be untradeable.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell a cosmetic cow mask. The mask would be untradeable.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell Mort Myre fungus to players who have completed the Nature Spirit quest.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell unicorn horn dust.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell desert goat horn dust.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell Wine of Zamorak.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell swamp tar.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell limpwurt roots.
Nightmare Zone's reward shop could sell vials of water.
The 2006 Halloween event will be re-opened. As a reward, it would give a black Halloween mask, which would be untradeable.

title: Kril's Magic Weapon
description: We've posted some images in our recent dev blog, showing options for the new magic weapon that'll be dropped by K'ril Tsutsaroth in the God Wars Dungeon.

questions.question: Which version of the weapon should we use?

title: Old School feature poll #11: PvP Worlds and more
description: This poll will run until Wednesday 16th October.

questions.question: An extra button will be added to the options menu, allowing you to disable the profanity filter.
Players who are in the your chat-channel will appear as purple dots on the minimap.
The anti-fire potion will give a warning message before its effect expires, and another message when it has expired.
An extra button will be added to the options menu, allowing you to change the 'Attack' option in PvP to a left-click 'Fight' option.
When the God Wars Dungeon comes out, the four bosses and their bodyguards will have left-click 'Fight' options instead of right-click 'Attack' options.
The bank's 'Withdraw-All' and 'Deposit-All' options will be moved below the 'Withdraw-X' and 'Deposit-X' options.
A new 'Withdraw-All-but-one' option will be added to the bank.
Bank PIN protection will be added to the Nightmare Zone reward shop.
Two of the existing old-school game worlds will become PvP worlds, with combat rules as described in the blog.
On PvP worlds, if they are launched, players will be prevented from attacking a target player in a single-way zone if the target has been attacking someone else in the last 10 seconds.
On PvP worlds, if they are launched, players will be able to attack a target player who is in combat against an NPC in a single-way zone.

On PvP worlds, if they are launched, players will get 10 secs of immunity from other players' attacks after teleporting. During this time, they will likewise be prevented from attacking other players.
On PvP worlds, if they are launched, the 'Protect Item' prayer will be disabled.

title: Old School player designed content poll
description: We received so many great ideas for new content from the community that it was really difficult to narrow it down to five. Have a read through this week's developer blog and let us know which idea you think is the best. This poll will run until Tuesday 29th October.

questions.question: Which of these player designed concepts would you like to see introduced into Old School the most? Read this week's developer blog to get all the information about them.

title: Old School feature poll #12: Player-designed content
description: This poll will run until Wednesday 6th November.

questions.question: We will introduce a series of roof top agility courses and a new agility outfit as described in the Roof Top Agility developer blog.
A button will be added to your options menu, allowing you to have your player-owned house rendered with its doors already open.
When you are in your own POH, you will see a 'Kick' option on your guests to let you expel them from the house.
POH herb burners will have their smoke changed to green to make it more visible.
POH herb burners will go out immediately if you leave the house unattended.
The Staff of the Dead's special attack will be prevented in the Duel Arena if Magic is forbidden for that duel.
The Staff of the Dead's autocast menu will have 'Flames of Zamorak' added.
Godswords have no stab-attack bonus, yet they have 'Stab' as their Accurate combat mode. Change this to a 'Crush' combat mode.
Monk robes will be counted as Saradomin items in the God Wars Dungeon.
When you try to dismantle a godsword, a menu box will pop up to confirm that you definitely want to do this.
A skill total of 280 will be required to vote in future polls.

title: Old School: About you!
description: We want to know more about you and what you want to happen in Old School. This poll will run until Sunday 17th November.

questions.question: Which age group do you fall in?
Are you male or female?
What is your favourite skill?
What is your favourite activity from the list below?
From the list below, what is your strongest motivation to play Old School?

results.voteOption: to get to the highest level you can

questions.question: Why do you play Old School rather than RS3?

results.voteOption: it has the old combat system
there is more sense of achievement when you level
you have control over which updates are made in game
you can compete in the hiscores
it holds a lot of nostagia for you

questions.question: What would your priority for future updates be?

results.voteOption: new areas of the map to explore
new ways to train non-combat skills
we're happy with how the game is and don't think it needs any more updates

title: Content Poll #13: Slayer & Christmas
description: Welcome to content poll #13. This poll will run until Wednesday 27th November.

questions.question: Shall we include the point system from the Smoking Kills quest?
Shall we introduce a co-operative slayer system so you can slay with friends?
Should we introduce a new slayer master, similar in level to Sumona?
Should we introduce the leaf bladed sword as drop from slayer creatures?
Should we introduce broad tip bolts to be bought from a slayer master?
Should we introduce a slayer ring to be bought using slayer points?
Should we introduce broad arrow heads to be bought from a slayer master?
Should we introduce the option to buy the ability to construct a slayer helmet using slayer points?
If the slayer helmet is introduced, should we allow it to be imbued like the black mask via Nightmare Zone?
If the slayer helmet is introduced, should we allow you to add the slayer gem to it?
Should we introduce a new slayer dungeon with segregated slayer monsters which you can only attack if you have them as an assignment?
Should we introduce two new slayer monsters which can be attacked if you have a slayer level of 80+?
If we introduce two new slayer monsters, should we introduce two new boss variants of the slayer monsters?
Should we introduce a time trial slayer mode which will reward players with additional slayer points if they complete their task within an allotted time period?
Would you like to see how many of each slayer monster you have ever killed?
Should your character automatically kill gargoyles, rock slugs, desert lizards and zygomites when they reach 0 health and you have the correct item in your inventory?
Should you be able to buy an increased amount of monsters of a task you have received using slayer points?
Should we introduce the Christmas 2006 event, the rewards for which will be the rainbow and black party hats?
Should we introduce a high risk PvP world and a high risk wilderness world where the protect item prayer is disabled?
Should POH Incense burners be re-lit before they run out, resetting their timer?
Should we add a colour highlight to the charge spell's start/stop messages?
Should we include digit grouping and commas for your XP popups?
Should a log of every fairy ring be added and allow the dials to be turned in both directions?
Should God Wars pets be added as ultra-rare drops to the God Wars bosses?
Should we add a bank chest to the respawn locations on PvP worlds to stop players teleblocking you on the way to the bank?

title: Old School feature poll #14: Minigames
description: This poll will run until Thursday 26th December.

questions.question: Should we introduce a matchmaking system to help you find other players to play group minigames with more easily?
Should we introduce a minigame reward shop where you can use points and tokens from multiple minigames to purchase new items?
If you vote for the minigame reward shop to be included, do you want it to sell the bonecrusher which works in the same way as the dungeoneering reward in RS3?
If you vote for the minigame reward shop to be included, do you want it to sell a rune pouch which will store multiple runes in but only take up one inventory space?
If you vote for the minigame reward shop to be included, do you want it to sell books that teach you the Augory and Rigour prayers?
If you vote for the minigame reward shop to be included, do you want it to sell all three levels of clue scrolls?
Should we introduce the Zamorak and Saradomin flags as rewards from the Castle Wars reward shop?
Should we add skirts as options to the Castle Wars armour rewards?
Should we add a ranged and mage armour set to the Castle Wars reward shop?
Should we allow players to buy bandages which work outside of Castle Wars in the same way as they do in Castle Wars?
If you kill five or more players without dying in Castle Wars, would you like to be buffed which will increase the damage you deal and make you more difficult to kill?
Should we add some siege weapons to Castle Wars to help break down the doors of the keep?
Should we allow players to obtain free elemental, mind, chaos and death runes within Castle Wars to cast magic at a reduced XP rate?
Should everyone on your team be rewarded with an extra Castle Wars ticket if your opponents fail to capture your flag?
Should we add a bank to the Blast Furnace room?
Should we reduce the smithing requirement to access the Blast Furnace to 30?
Should we allow players to use the egg launcher in Barbarian Assault while in combat?
When the call changes in Barbarian Assault, should we change the colour of the word to white?
Should we add fighter legs with the same stats as the fighter skirt but with a +1 strength modifier to the Barbarian Assault reward shop?
Should the fighter skirt have a +1 strength modifier added?
Should we remove splitbark armour defensive requirements?
Should we allow players to get to Trouble Brewing without completing Cabin Fever and drop them into a lobby area so they can't access the rest of the island?
Should we remove the level 40 Cooking requirement from Trouble Brewing?
Should the alchemy value of Armadyl armour be increased so that it is protected on death over crystal equipment and Barrows equipment?
Should the alchemy value of the Armadyl crossbow be increased so that it is protected on death over crystal equipment and Barrows equipment?
Should the Dark Mage in the Abyss be contactable via the Contact NPC spell on the Lunar spellbook?
Should Nieve, the new Slayer Master, be contactable via the Contact NPC spell on the Lunar spellbook?
Should Fishing shops and Herblore shops sell packs of 100 vials, feathers or fishing bait to make it easier to buy these items in large quantities?
Should the game applet show your current health, prayer points and run energy on icons near the minimap? A toggle option would allow players to hide these icons if they did not wish to see them.
Should the Smithing menu offer a Make-X option?
Should the Digsite expert be able to identify all your Unidentified Liquid vials at once?

Should Otto Godblessed be willing to convert a Zamorakian spear into a single-handed Zamorakian hasta on payment of 300,000 coins? The hasta would be tradeable and would have the same stats and requirements as the spear.
Should a fruit tree patch be added in Lletya along with a gardener and tool leprechaun?
Should a supply of spades be added to the buildings near the Barrows?

title: Old School feature poll #15: Rejuvenating the Wilderness
description: Before voting in this poll, make sure you have read the latest developer blog - Rejuvenating the Wilderness 2 (Quick find code: 317-318-717-65268171). This will give you some important context for these questions. This poll will run until Wednesday 29th January.

questions.question: Would you like us to upgrade the Wilderness to the basic level as featured in the latest developer blog called 'Rejuvenating the Wilderness 2'?
Should we stop players from teleporting out of the KBD lair?
Should we add three new rune rocks to the Ice Plateau?
Should we add the Fountain of Rune to the maze area in the far East of level 50 Wilderness?
Once we have solved the issue of luring players into the Wilderness using the trade windows, should we remove the Wilderness Ditch?
Should we add a dungeon of God Wars creatures to the Wilderness?
Should a player be able to see how many times they have been killed in the Wilderness, how many players they have killed in the Wilderness and the ratio between them?
Should we replace red dragons with lava dragons in the Wilderness?
If lava dragons enter the Wilderness, should you be able to get three times the amount of XP if you bury their bones in the Lava Dragon Isle?
Should revenants be added to the Wilderness in the Graveyard of Shadows?
If revenants are added should the Graveyard of Shadows become a multi combat zone?
Should we allow players to be able to attack other players in a single way combat area even if either are currently in combat with an NPC?
Should we remove 10 worlds from the world list to boost activity on the other worlds?
Should tradeable items become visible immediately to all players if their owner chooses to drop them on the ground in the Wilderness?

Should the cave kraken Slayer creature drop a new level 75 staff with a built-in spell for use against monsters? The spell is cast 20% faster than normal spells, with a max hit of 20 at Magic level 75, rising to 28 at level 99. Check the blog for full details.
Should we increase the alch value of Bandos armour very slightly to make it protect on death over crystal equipment and Barrows equipment?
Should we add a level 10 Agility shortcut to shorten the route from Varrock's west bank to the spirit tree?
Should the run energy icon near the minimap toggle your Run Mode setting when you click it?
Should the prayer points icon near the minimap allow you to select some 'quick prayers' and toggle them on and off when you click it?
Should the health icon near the minimap allow you to cure poison or cure disease when you click it, provided you have suitable items in your inventory?
Should we increase the cool-down time on the minigame teleports to 1 hour?
Should the God Wars Dungeon altars give a message stating how long before you'll next be able to use them?
If you are in a chat-channel when you log out, should you automatically attempt to re-join it on login?
Should you have the option to pay some Slayer points to unlock mithril dragons as a new task from Duradel and Nieve?
Should you have the option to pay some Slayer points to unlock aviansies as a new task from Duradel, Chaeldar and Nieve?

Should we add new channels to the minigame grouping panel for finding Black Arm / Phoenix Gang members, finding God Wars Dungeon parties and finding Waterbirth Island parties? These channels would not have teleports associated with them.
Should we add loot broadcasts to the Kalphite Queen, the King Black Dragon, the Dagannoth Kings and the Chaos Elemental?
Should watered saplings have a (w) appended to their names?
Should the Total Level box on the stats interface have a tooltip that shows your total XP?
Should we add 24 more bank spaces to everyone's bank?

title: Old School feature poll #16
description: Before voting in this poll, make sure you have read the latest developer blog - Content Poll 16 (Quick find code: 317-318-193-65291196). This poll will run until Wednesday 19th February.

questions.question: Should the middle mouse button become an additional method of rotating the camera? This would have a toggle; if disabled, the button could be used for clicking as before.
Should the imbued Slayer helm and imbued black mask give a 15% boost to the Magic damage you deal against your assigned Slayer target? They already give this boost for melee and Ranged damage.
Should the imbued Slayer helm have a +3 mage attack bonus, a +3 range attack bonus and a +10 mage defence bonus?
Should the Trident of the Seas be able to attack players in all PvP areas, including the Wilderness, PvP worlds, the Duel Arena, Castle Wars and the TzHaar Fight Pit?
Should the Trident of the Seas be able to attack players in Castle Wars and the TzHaar Fight Pit?
Should Ava's devices have an option for making them stop gathering random items?
Once you've completed Mourning's Ends Part 2, should the Slayer ring be able to teleport you to the dark beast tunnels?
Should your Special Attack energy restore 5x faster for a minute after you've died?
When making spell tablets in a player-owned house, should the lectern offer options for Make-X and Make-All?
Should the bunny at the swaying tree near Rellekka drop the rabbit bone needed for the Rag and Bone Man list?

When you dig up a stump in a Farming tree patch, should you get extra roots for having a high Farming level? You would get one extra root for every 8 Farming levels above the minimum required to grow the tree, up to a maximum of 4 roots.
When you pay a gardener to chop down a tree for you, should you receive tree roots as if you'd dug up the tree yourself?
Should the Pharaoh's Sceptre have its number of charges appended to its name?
Should clue scrolls have '(easy)', '(medium)' or '(hard)' appended to their names to show their level?
If you drop a Runecrafting pouch when dying, should it remain on the ground, visible only to you, instead of vanishing?
Should the Pyramid Plunder overlay show your remaining time more accurately?
Godswords currently have an accurate combat style of Crush. Should we change this to Slash?
Should the music loop button remember its setting over logout?
Should composite bows be changed to have the same attack speed as a shortbow, with the magic composite bow's special attack becoming the same as the magic shortbow?
When picking fruit you've grown in tree or bush patches, should you automatically keep picking fruits until the patch is empty?
Should dark beasts and bloodveld have a chance of dropping hard clue scrolls? This would be dropped in addition to their existing loot, and would not affect the chances of getting other items.

When you left-click on your cannon while it's firing, you automatically reload it. However, if your cannon is empty the left-click does nothing. If you have cannonballs in your inventory, should left clicking your cannon reload it when it is empty?
Should we add a chat-channel to the Minigame Grouping panel for finding POH parties? There would be no teleport associated with this channel.
Should players be able to hop from one world to another without waiting for the 30 second timer?
Proselyte legs/skirt currently have the same prayer bonus as Initiate legs or monk robes. Should the Proselyte legs/skirt have their prayer bonus increased by 1?

Being able to train magic effectively in Nightmare Zone without the need to use player created runes is having a severe effect on the runecrafting skill. To allow you to keep getting the current XP and maintain the value of the runecrafting skill should you only get magic XP in Nightmare Zone if you use your own runes?
Should we introduce an activity timer which will log you out of the game whether or not you are in combat if you have not interacted with the client for 5 minutes?
Should the combat XP you get in Nightmare Zone scale up so you get 100% of the XP if you and your party (if you are in one) have unlocked all of the bosses available in the Nightmare Zone?

title: Player Designed Content competition - Brains over brawn
description: We had so many excellent entries for the Player Designed Content competition - Brains over brawn that creating a shortlist was really difficult. However we have managed to get down to 8 of our favourite ideas, to view these ideas please read the PDC developer blog (QFC 317-318-639-65308374). Please vote for your favourite idea below before Sunday 2nd March. We will then create a design document of the idea with the most votes which has all the fine details in. You will then be able to vote on adding that idea in the next content poll and as usual it will require 75% to pass.

questions.question: Which of these entries for the Player Designed Content competition would you like to see added to the game?

title: Old School feature poll #17
description: This poll will run until Wednesday 12th March.

questions.question: Should we add the Motherlode Mine update as described in the 'PDC: Motherlode Mine' developer blog?
The Easter event in 2006 asked you to help the hypnotised bunnies deliver eggs to the children of Gielinor. Would you like us to add this for this Easter's event?

During the Easter event in 2005 you could use a basket full of Easter eggs which made you skip rather than walk, you could not keep this item when the event finished. Should an additional reward for the Easter event this year be the Easter egg basket from the 2005 Easter event?
Should we add more options for hairstyles and hair colour to the barber in Falador?
Should we add more clothing styles and colours to Thessalia in Varrock?
If a player picks up an item that spawns in Nightmare Zone, should it be destroyed if it is dropped again? This will affect runes, pickaxes, anti-dragon breath shields, etc.

title: Old School Wilderness Feedback Poll
description: This poll has been created based on your feedback after the Rejuvenating the Wilderness update. For more detail on the questions below, please read the Wilderness Feedback developer blog QFC: 317-318-790-65327830 This poll will run until Wednesday 26th March.

questions.question: Should the crazed archaeologist have his fedora added to his drop table as a reward?

Should the chaos fanatic and chaos elemental have the chaos creature pet added to their drop lists as a rare drop? This drop won't replace any existing drops and when the pet is following you it will not talk or appear on the minimap.

Should you be able to recharge your amulet of glory, skills necklace and combat bracelet at the fountain of rune and receive 6 charges rather than the usual 4? You will need to have access to the Heroes' Guild to be able to use the amulet of glory on the fountain of rune and access to the totem in the Legends' Guild to use the skills necklace and combat bracelet on the fountain of rune.

Should you be able to charge your ring of wealth at the fountain of rune and receive 5 charges to teleport to either Miscellania, Varrock town square, Falador Park or to Dondakan in the Keldagrim mine?
Should we add ancient warrior armour sets (not the weapons) similar to the armour sets of Morrigan, Statius and Zuriel to the drop lists of the three Wilderness bosses?
Should the lava dragon drop a lava dragon scale which can be used to make extended antifire potions?
Should we add an npc inside the resource area who can note any item gained from the area for the cost of 50gp per item?
While chopping the log left from a dead ent, should you have a chance of getting a birds nest?
Should dark crabs heal 24 instead of 22?

Should the red chinchompas in the Wilderness be changed to become black chinchompas with a hunting requirement of 73 and ranged requirement of 65? These will be slightly more powerful than red chinchompas.
Should there be a chance to loot hard level clue scrolls from the chests in the Rogues' Castle?
Should we increase the limit for the Ecumenical keys to 5?
Should God dragonhide armour and God rune armour which are acquired from clue scrolls receive a prayer bonus of +1 per item?
Should we allow players to add to their Kill/Death count in PvP worlds in the vicinity of the respawn points?
Should we replace the dragon hatchet's special attack with an ability which will temporarily increase your woodcutting level by 3?

title: Old School - Update priorities & new slayer drops
description: In August last year we ran a poll to ask you what you think our priorities should be for Old School. We think that now is the time to run a similar poll. Below you will find some of the most talked about content updates over the last few months and we want to ask you tell us what your top three are. We will poll three identical questions. At the end of the poll we will combine the results to identify the updates which are most important to you. Having the same question three times will allow you to vote for more than one update if you are excited by more than one of these options. Of course, if you are only interested in one update then you can vote for it in all the questions. Although the results of this poll will identify to us what is important to you, it won't necessarily be possible for us to release these updates in the order of importance and therefore poll these ideas in that order. Some of the updates listed below will require new skills to be brought into the team, new technology or new game engine features. Knowing what is important to you will allow us to start work on acquiring the new skills, technology and anything else to be able to deliver these updates, even if the updates are months in the future.

questions.question: Which of these updates is your first priority?

results.voteOption: a clan wars system designed not to have a negative impact on wilderness activity
a pvp activity using the old bounty hunter mechanic designed not to have a negative impact on wilderness activity
a solution to the trading issues
achievement diaries for many areas of gielinor
clue scroll expansion featuring new rewards, clues and puzzles
the remaining content from the game archive including the path of glouphrie quest, land of the goblins quest and zmi altar
uber quest which advances the stories of multiple quest lines

questions.question: Which of these updates is your second priority?

results.voteOption: a clan wars system designed not to have a negative impact on wilderness activity
a pvp activity using the old bounty hunter mechanic designed not to have a negative impact on wilderness activity
a solution to the trading issues
achievement diaries for many areas of gielinor
clue scroll expansion featuring new rewards, clues and puzzles
the remaining content from the game archive including the path of glouphrie quest, land of the goblins quest and zmi altar
uber quest which advances the stories of multiple quest lines

questions.question: Which of these updates is your third priority?

results.voteOption: a clan wars system designed not to have a negative impact on wilderness activity
a pvp activity using the old bounty hunter mechanic designed not to have a negative impact on wilderness activity
a solution to the trading issues
achievement diaries for many areas of gielinor
clue scroll expansion featuring new rewards, clues and puzzles
the remaining content from the game archive including the path of glouphrie quest, land of the goblins quest and zmi altar
uber quest which advances the stories of multiple quest lines

questions.question: Should the kraken boss and the cave kraken drop the kraken tentacle as described in the New Slayer Drops developer blog?
Should the Abyssal Tentacle have an attack style for training strength?
Should the smoke devil boss drop the smoke battlestaff?
Should the smoke devil and the smoke devil boss drop the occult necklace as described in the New Slayer Drops developer blog?

title: Old School feature poll #18
description: Please make sure you read the Content Poll #18 developer blog (Quick find code: 317-318-113-65346920) before voting in this poll. This poll will run until Wednesday 23rd April.

questions.question: Should we alter the bank to give you bank tabs? You will be able to toggle this feature on and off via a bank settings menu.
When you manually drop a stack of chinchompas in the Wilderness, should they fall to the ground like they do if you die with them?
Banners & flags, such as the Castle Wars team flags, have controlled and defensive combat stances. Should we change them to have accurate, aggressive, controlled and defensive combat stances?

Should you be able to imbue the Salve amulet and its (e) version at Nightmare Zone for 800k points to have their effect in Ranged and Magic. The effects will behave in the same way as they do for melee and will only apply to the primary target in a multi target attack.
When a monster dies and drops a clue, should the clue appear in addition to other drops rather than instead of them?
Should the fight caves display a notification showing the current wave in the chatbox?
Should the entire Castle Wars lobby area be safe in PvP worlds to avoid luring?
Should we add a +20 ranged defence bonus to Bandos boots?
Should we change the crystal shield's negative ranged bonus from -10 to -5?
Should the bracelet of regeneration have combat stats similar to what it had in the 2008 update?
When a player is hit with ice barrage, should the spell animation be different based on whether that player is already frozen?
Should the rock cake be changed to damage you for 10% of your health per click to help Dharok users?

Should the doors or gates near the Falador farming patch, Port Phasmatys' forge, Keldagrim Palace, the house with the stove in Catherby, generals in the Troll Stronghold, Castle Wars lobby and Duel Arena be changed to be open permanently?
Should we restructure the Options interface and add a button to remove roofs? We would still keep the ::toggleroof command.
Should we add the ability for you to see your face close up so you can take a screenshot of your character to share your best Old School moments with your friends?
Should we reduce the cost of a medium clue scroll from Trouble Brewing to 300 pieces of eight? This will mean it will take about an hour to get one.

Should we add a right click option for skipping dialogue when repairing pouches at the Dark Mage, buying rope from Ned, travelling on a ship from Lokar Searunner and Captain Bentley and the process of going through the Shantay Pass?
Should you be able to see the remaining charges on binding necklaces?
Should we change the name of unfinished potions to include which herb is in the vial? For example: Guam potion (unf).
Should we speed up adding items into a compost bin?
If you hover over your stats, would you like to see the remaining XP until the next level? You will be able to toggle this feature on and off.
Should you be able to right click spirit trees and choose the destination spirit tree you want to teleport directly to?

title: Old School Trading Solution Survey
description: We are working on possible features for the trading solution which the community said it wanted. Now it is time to find out what features are important to you in the trading solution. Read the questions below and select the most appropriate answer for yourself. This survey will run until Monday 5th May.

questions.question: How much interaction should you have when trading?

results.voteOption: i would like to meet up with the player and trade them.
i would like to know who i am trading with but don't need to meet up with them.
i don't mind as long as i get the items.
i'd rather not have to interact with anyone to complete the trade.

questions.question: Should the new trading solution work when you are not online?

results.voteOption: the trading solution should work only when both parties are online.
your trades should only be available for a limited period after you have gone offline.
the trading solution should work when you are either online or offline.

questions.question: Should there be an official guide price for items?

results.voteOption: each item should have an official guide price available for players to see.
there should be no official guide price that players can see or other sales information available for an item.

questions.question: Should there be a tax on trades?

results.voteOption: all trades through the trading solution should be taxed by a small amount.
all trades above a minimum value of 1m gp made through the trading solution should be taxed by a small amount.
there should be no tax on any trades through the trading solution.

title: Old School feature poll #19
description: Please make sure you read the developer blog: Clan Wars & Clues(Quick find code: 317-318-975-65361271) before voting in this poll. This poll will run until Wednesday 14th May.

questions.question: Should we release safe Clan Wars with a selection of arenas as described in the Clan Wars & Clues developer blog?
Should Clan Wars have a king of the hill battle mode?
Should Clan Wars have a team oddskull mode?
Should Clan Wars have a target deathmatch mode?
Should Clan Wars have a timed deathmatch mode?
Should Clan Wars have a safe free-for-all arena?
Should we add the treasure trail expansion as described in the Clan Wars & Clues developer blog?
Should we reduce the penance fighter hat requirement from 45 Defence to 40, to match the torso?
Should you be able to store the Trouble Brewing outfits in the costume rooms in your house?
Should Ahrim's staff be able to auto-cast Saradomin Strike?

Should you be able to buy gem and coal bags from the Motherlode Mine shop for 100 nuggets of gold each? The coal bag will hold 27 ores of coal, the gem bag will store up to 60 of each gem up to dragonstone. You will only be able to own one of each bag at a time.
Should you not be able to see the options on other players' pets when you click on them?
Should the Prospector's outfit function as desert robes so it reduces the rate your water is depleted in the desert?
Should the special attack button show the percentage energy you've got, and indicate whether you have enough energy to perform the special attack with your currently equipped weapon?
Should there be a toggle to turn on or off the smoke down the smokey well near Pollnivneach?
Should you be able to disable the warning messages when entering the caves for the cave kraken and the smoke devil boss?
Should we add a deposit box to the Warriors' Guild bank?
Should we improve black salamanders by slightly increasing their Xp, adding two trees and rearranging the existing trees?

Should you be able to decide where your attack option should appear on NPCs and other players? You can choose to make your attack option always a left click, always a right click or to have its priority chosen off your combat level, you can change this setting at any time.
Should items that can be 'operated' when equipped list all their options in the right-click menu?

title: Player Designed Content: New Skill survey
description: We have created a shortlist of potential new skills from your submissions for the PDC-New Skill competition, now it is your time to vote for your favourite. To find out about the potential new skills please read the developer blog: PDC - New Skill (Quick find code: 317-318-167-65375399).  This poll will run until Wednesday 28th May.

questions.question: Which of these skills is your favourite?

title: Old School feature poll #20 (Trading Solution)
description: Please make sure you read the developer blog: Trading Solution V2(Quick find code: 317-318-358-65379451) before voting in this poll. This poll will run until Wednesday 4th June.

questions.question: Should we introduce a trading post where you can post trade offers which will be visible to everyone? Offers will only appear when the seller is online and you will need to trade through the existing trading system.
If Question 1 passes, should players' trade offers be visible on the trading post when they are offline?
If players' trades are visible when they are offline, should they be visible for more than 6 hours?
If Question 1 passes, should players be able trade items through the trading post rather than having to meet up to use the existing trade system?

If we introduce a trading post through which you are able to buy items, should you be able to buy only part of a seller's offer if you want? For example, if the seller is selling 1,000 of an item, you can buy only 100 if you wish.
If we introduce a trading post through which you are able to buy items, should you be able to add buy offers for items and let the trading post find the best match for you?
If we introduce a trading post that matches offers for you, should your buy offers be visible when you are offline?

title: Old School feature poll - Rewarding Rewards
description: Please make sure you read the developer blog: Rewarding Rewards(Quick find code: 317-318-366-65389159) before voting in this poll. This poll will run until Wednesday 18th June.

questions.question: Should we introduce the Ring of the Gods, Treasonous ring & Tyrannical ring as drops from the Wilderness bosses?
If question one passes, should the Ring of the Gods act as a god item aligned to all gods at the same time?
If question one passes, should you be able to imbue the Ring of the Gods, Treasonous ring and Tyrannical ring at the minigame reward shop to double their bonuses?
If question one passes, should you be able to combine the Warrior, Treasonous & Tyrannical rings to create a Ring of Aggression?
Should we introduce the Rangers' tunic as an elite clue scroll reward?
Should we introduce Holy sandals as a medium clue scroll reward?
Should we introduce Bandos, Armadyl & Ancient god books as described in the developer blog?
Should we introduce God halos to the Castle Wars reward shop as described in the developer blog?
Should dark crabs heal 25% of your base hitpoints? This means they will only heal 24 if you have 96+ hitpoints.
Should we introduce amylase to the Mark of Grace store which can be used to create Stamina potions, as described in the developer blog?
Should you be able to use an extra trap than you have the level for when in the Wilderness? You can already do this at black chinchompas.
Should we introduce the game filter that can hide repetitive game messages?
Should we increase the number of available bank spaces to 600?
Should we increase the high alchemy value of the Pharaoh's sceptre to 50,000 coins so that you are more likely to protect it on death?
Should we add a pause option to autochat?
Should we buff the drop table of the Kalphite Queen to offer a better return over time? No signature drops will be added or have their drop chance modified.
Should we add right-click teleport options to the POH amulet of glory?
Should we increase the click-zone on the POH amulet of glory, abyssal rifts, rope swings and wilderness levers?
Should we block walk on the permanent fires within the Rogues Den bank area?
Should tool leprechauns be able to note tree roots?
Should chat from your duelling partner be visible in the trade chat tab while you are setting up the duel?

title: Old School feature poll - Content Poll #22
description: Please make sure you read the developer blog: Content Poll #22(Quick find code: 317-318-826-65414590) before voting in this poll. This poll will run until Wednesday 16th July.

questions.question: Should the Odium and Malediction wards be graphically reworked?
Should the Occult necklace be graphically reworked?
Should the Graceful outfit be graphically reworked?
Should the dragon pickaxe be graphically reworked?
Should the Staff of the Dead special attack animation be graphically reworked?
Should the kraken tentacle inventory icon be graphically reworked?
Should the steam battlestaff be graphically reworked?
Should the God Wars generals drop a very rare pet of themselves?
Should the Dagannoth Kings drop a very rare pet of themselves?

Should you be able to pay the mage in west Ardougne 200k to upgrade your Iban staff to store 2,500 charges?

title: Old School feature poll - Artisan and Bounty Hunter
description: Please make sure you read the two developer blogs relating to these questions. This poll will run until Wednesday 23rd July.

questions.question: Should we add the artisan skill in its current form to Old School? You can read all about artisan in the developer blog 'Artisan' (QFC: 317-318-591-65419620).
Should we add Bounty Hunter as described in the developer blog 'Bounty Hunter 2'? (QFC: 317-318-782-65427484)

title: Old School in-game poll survey
description: Whenever you vote in polls like this, you currently have to log into the website. We're planning to offer you a menu for voting within the game itself. An in-game voting menu might be more convenient for you, and it would give us the opportunity to include web links for illustrations, and other helpful things we can't currently do on the website form. There are quite a few ways we could offer in-game polls. For example, we could add polling stations to major towns or banks, or we could add a button to the game screen, or build it into an in-game item. In this survey, we'd like you to tell us which of the possibilities appeal to you.

questions.question: Where would you prefer to vote in polls: in the game or on the website?
Would you be happy voting through poll booths installed in major town centres, such as Varrock Market?
Would you be happy voting through poll booths installed in bank buildings?
Would you be happy for Town Criers to offer the poll menu?
Would you be happy for the Varrock Herald newspaper to offer the poll menu?
Would you be happy for a new 'Orb of Suffrage' item to offer the poll menu? The orb would be made available for free.
Would you be happy for us to shrink the Report Abuse button slightly, creating space for a new Poll button?
Would you be happy for us to add a new Poll button near the minimap?
Would you be happy for us to add a new Poll button to the Options panel?

title: Old School feature poll - Content Poll #23
description: Please make sure you read the developer blog: Content Poll #23(Quick find code: 380-381-67-65442315) before voting in this poll. This poll will run until Wednesday 13th August.

questions.question: Should we add poll booths to the game world so that players have the option of voting either in the game or on the website?
Should we add the Bounty Hunter target system into the wilderness on one world?

Should we add the ability to create a tradeable super combat potion from a super attack potion, super defence potion, super strength potion and torstol herb that provides no additional stat boost? The potion would act as all three potions combined into one, saving inventory space.

Should the special attacks of the dragon spear, Zamorakian spear and Zamorakian hasta be changed so that they do not queue and, instead, ignore incoming special attacks if the target is already affected?
Should Recipe for Disaster gloves be converted to an appropriate amount of coins when lost on death?
Should the Superheat and Enchant Jewellery spells be updated so that, if you cast them too fast, one casting is queued up to run when the last one's finished?
Should we add Marks of Grace to all other Agility courses?
Should we add a furnace and anvil to the Wilderness Resource Area?
Should the rewards from Barbarian Assault gambles be improved?
Should we add a super rare Penance Queen pet as a reward from high level gambles?

When you grind something with a pestle and mortar, should your character automatically continue grinding all of that item in your inventory? A player who can click the items rapidly would still be able to grind slightly faster.
Should we add +15 ranged defence to Bandos boots? (This was offered in Poll 18 with +20 and received 74.8% support.)
Should we have a dedicated arena for No Movement duels to prevent griefing in duels?
Should the Iban staff be able to autocast Iban Blast?
Should we add pet insurance? Show an NPC your pet and if you lose it you can pay a substantial fee to re-obtain it.
Should we add a POH menagerie - a room in your POH that can store your pets? If this question passes, the maximum number of rooms you can build in your house at any level will be increased by 1.
Should you be able to use the minigame teleports without joining the minigame chat?
Should a tooltip showing your friends' previous display names be added?
Should Ankous found in the wilderness drop higher quantities of dark fishing bait?
Should we add a graceful outfit set bonus that makes your energy recharge 30% faster when wearing the complete set?
Should your special attack bar be visible when wielding a weapon that doesn't have one? It would be recoloured to show that it is inactive.
Should we add a right-click quick-exit option to the exits within Pyramid Plunder?

title: Old School Priority Poll #3
description: Back in March we ran a poll to ask you what you think our priorities should be for Old School. As we have delivered a large majority of the content that you voted as a priority we think it is time to hold another one. In the last priority poll, many of you voted for some kind of trading update. Since then, the trading post has been polled, and it will be delivered once the engine team gets a chance to create their side of it. While we're waiting for that, we'd like to address some of the other game update requests you've sent us. Below you will find some of the most talked about content updates over the last few months and we want to ask you tell us what your top three are. We will poll three identical questions. At the end of the poll we will combine the results to identify the updates which are most important to you. Having the same question three times will allow you to vote for more than one update if you are excited by more than one of these options. Of course, if you are only interested in one update then you can vote for it in all the questions.

questions.question: Which of these updates is your first priority?

results.voteOption: achievement diaries for many areas of gielinor
a raid dungeon which large amounts of players need to work together to explore
a multiplayer boss which will require large amounts of players working together to defeat
a new high level solo boss
a new continent increasing the map size significantly
an update to the slayer skill
an update to the construction skill
an update to the firemaking skill

questions.question: Which of these updates is your second priority?

results.voteOption: achievement diaries for many areas of gielinor
a raid dungeon which large amounts of players need to work together to explore
a multiplayer boss which will require large amounts of players working together to defeat
a new high level solo boss
a new continent increasing the map size significantly
an update to the slayer skill
an update to the construction skill
an update to the firemaking skill

questions.question: Which of these updates is your third priority?

results.voteOption: achievement diaries for many areas of gielinor
a raid dungeon which large amounts of players need to work together to explore
a multiplayer boss which will require large amounts of players working together to defeat
a new high level solo boss
a new continent increasing the map size significantly
